_sText:
This map was originally started by Assaulted Combat in the late summer of '06. He disappeared and I took over. With what he left to me, I had to basically recreate everything except the ramps; Which I will give credit to him for.

Changes:

- added a block bullets brush at spawn to prevent spawn killing wich in previous versions didnt worked on CSS BETA

- New textures 

- Button wich makes u leave the jail from inside in 10 seconds 

- Camera out side jail and a monitor in jail

- New levels

- Weapons trails

- Health Room

- Weapons room

and more ...
